scripts.gitpod-prepare: npm run git-shh-to-https; (yes | sudo apt install screen); (yes | sudo apt install rsync); (yes | sudo apt install net-tools); screen -S docker -d -m sudo docker-up
scripts.packages-ci: (cd packages; for d in */; do (cd $d && npm ci); done)
scripts.hasura-example: (cd packages/hasura-example; screen -S hasura-example -d -m bash -c 'PORT=3001 npm run dev'; sleep 20; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate;)
scripts.deepgraph: (cd packages/deepgraph; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate;)
scripts.deepgraph-app: (cd packages/deepgraph-app; screen -S deepgraph-app -d -m bash -c 'PORT=3007 npm run dev';)
scripts.hasura: (export JWT_SECRET='{"type":"HS256", "key": "3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R"}'; cd packages/hasura; screen -S hasura -d -m npm run docker)
scripts.materialized-path: (cd packages/materialized-path; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate && npm run test)
scripts.local: export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; npm ci; (npm run hasura; sleep 10; npm run materialized-path; sleep 10; export JWT_SECRET='3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R'; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_EXAMPLE_URL=localhost:3001; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPGRAPH_APP_URL=localhost:3007; npm run hasura-example; npm run deepgraph-app; npm run deepgraph;)
scripts.gitpod: export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_SQL=bigint; export MIGRATIONS_ID_TYPE_GQL=bigint; npm ci; npm run gitpod-prepare; (npm run hasura; sleep 10; npm run materialized-path; sleep 10; export JWT_SECRET='3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R'; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; export MIGRATIONS_EXAMPLE_URL=$(gp url 3001); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1; export HASURA_PATH=$(echo $(gp url 8080) | awk -F[/:] '{print $4}'); export HASURA_SSL=1; export MIGRATIONS_DEEPGRAPH_APP_URL=$(gp url 3007); npm run hasura-example; npm run deepgraph-app; npm run deepgraph;)
scripts.git-shh-to-https: git config --global url."https://".insteadOf git://; git config --global url."https://github.com/".insteadOf ssh://git@github.com/;
